ModMetaData.name: Replace Stuff (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: 404Utopia
ModMetaData.description: Continuation of Uuugggg's original mod. This mod is still viable as 1.6 changes only adds blueprints overwalls. Without this mod, your colonists still need to take down buildings in order to replace them, with this installed replacement of structures is done without actually ever breaking down the original structure. 1.6 simply added the ability to queue the process of taking down buildings and replacing them.
